title: Quality Assurance Specialist

 * Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications and a strong affinity for computerized systems.
 * Strong interpersonal and communication skills
 * Proficiency in English and German language (verbal and written)
 * Working knowledge of GMP guidelines is preferred
   
   
   

Benefits


 * Sodexo staff discounts
 * 30 days holiday
 * Performance based Bonus
 * Standard pension
 * More to come as we grow
   
   

Company Values:

Aim Higher - Our motto and values.

Your expertise in aerospace standards, supplier management, and knowledge of electronics and embedded software development will contribute to the successful development of advanced motor systems.

 * Familiarity with supplier management, including managing external suppliers and ensuring their adherence to program requirements.
 * Knowledge of electronics and embedded software development for motor systems, enabling effective collaboration with cross-functional teams.
 * Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze complex systems and propose innovative solutions.
 * Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities effectively.

title: Data-driven Safety Argumentation Expert - SOTIF / Monte Carlo / ISO Standards
description:
Data-driven Safety Argumentation Expert - SOTIF / Monte Carlo / ISO Standards

Full-Time - Permanent

Onsite - Munich




We are currently partnered with a world-leading research center in Germany working on cutting-edge next-generation projects within AD/ADAS. The team is looking to expand their headcount with a Data-driven Safety Argumentation Expert.




Responsibilities:

 * Foster an innovation-driven mindset to explore new approaches for achieving safety goals, pushing the boundaries of AI-based safety and challenging the state-of-the-art.
 * Develop SOTIF safety argumentation concepts using statistical methods and probabilistic frameworks.
 * Extract and analyze real-world data to generate safety evidence that supports safety argumentation.
 * Derive effective Verification and Validation (V&V) measures and requirements for data collection to strengthen data-driven safety arguments.
 * Stay informed on industry standards, regulations, trends, and best practices, sharing key insights influencing our ADS solutions.




Qualifications:

 * MSc or PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent experience in automotive system/software safety engineering.
 * Extensive experience in data analytics, statistical methods, and probabilistic frameworks.
 * Proficiency in Bayesian methods, Monte Carlo simulations, sensitivity analysis, or similar approaches.
 * Practical experience in automotive safety engineering, including defining safety concepts and working with ISO 26262, ISO 21448, and safety analysis methods such as HAZOP, HARA, FMEA, FTA, and STPA, as well as scenario-based verification and residual risk quantification.







If you are interested in this Data-driven Safety Argumentation Expert position, please send a CV to ww@eu-recruit.com
